title: Spend Less on Fees
description: Confirm payments to as many recipients as you like in an efficient batch and only pay the fees when block space is cheap.

title: Lightning Network, Supercharged
description: Channels without counterparty signing. As many as you like. Routing as many HTLCS as you want.

title: Next-Gen Smart Contracts
description: Build new systems with advanced capabilities, like automatic wallet vaults.
